kill_switch_message_text: Testing my p33ps.  Go outside and play.
mandatory_update_message_text: A mandatory update is required in order for you to continue using this application.  Please forgive our mess.
terms_of_use_text: Use our stuff in the way it was intended please.

versions.changes:
* Initial Release. Feedback to support@android-fu.com greatly appreciated.
* Fetch movies, refresh on scroll.

* Added a QuickReturnHeader for the Refresh Button.
* Show an error dialog when there's a JSON parsing error.
* Fixed the Rotten Tomatoes API JSON Exception.
